title: Karuizawa Syndrome
synopsis: It  is an action comedy about a young man's persistent sexual fantasies. It has 4 distinct art styles: a manga style, a SD style, a realistic style, and a art-graphic pencil style.
characters: ['Aizawa, Kouhei', 'Naruse, Dai', 'Kuonji, Noriko', 'Minowa, Takanari', 'Minowa, Milk', 'Chiryuu', 'Onda, Jirou', 'Kinoshita, Kumiko']
